thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Marshall

author: Marshall
title: Marshall
text: B&H is a good company. They ship out goods promptly. Order has always been correct. Small problem, but same with competitor: One time they shipped items in a box that is too shallow to allow and item to be wrapped in bubble wrap on four sides. I have received other items from them in boxes whose size would have allowed a snugger fit and still let them wrap four sides in bubble wrap. Otherwise, totally pleased.
